article.Heading: GSTN-GoM 3rd meet: Committee reviews progress on IT issues
article.Summary: The 3rd meeting of the goods and services tax network (GSTN) and the Group of Ministers (GoM) on GST took place on Saturday to address IT related issues.
article.Body:
The 3rd meeting of the goods and services tax network (GSTN) and the Group of Ministers (GoM) on GST took place on Saturday to address IT related issues.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Rukmini Rao giving a quick summary of all the key takeaways.
